title: Helvetica Film
content: Everyone heard about it? It is going to be shown at the South by Southwest Film Festival in Austin, Texas, on March 13th. Further details, visit: [http://www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003115543/http:/www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html "http://www.helveticafilm.com/screenings.html")
author: missgiggles
